preface.title: Credits
preface.para: CandyFolds was based on the WhiteSpace (by Nathan Jones and Andre Kaplan) plugin's fold-guides.

chapter.title: Description
chapter.para: CandyFolds draws colored indentation-guides on the text-area to improve code readability. An indentation-guide is a vertical line drawn following the text indentation. The color used by each indentation-guide can be configured using regular expressions: the regular expression tests the line of text on the starting point of the indentation, if it matches then the specified color is used to draw the indentation-guide.
Visit the CandyFold's home page (http://candyfolds.sf.net) to report bugs or post comments.
